datasets.title: Central Asia flood risk estimates
datasets.description: Fluvial flood risk estimates, including return period loss estimates, annual average loss estimates and event loss tables
datasets.purpose: Regional risk modelling. These data have been derived on a regional scale for the purpose of consistent regional multi-country hazard and risk assessment. Application of this information on smaller scales should be done with care. Importantly on a local scale, it is often the case that more detailed history and hazard information is required to perform such hazard and risk modelling, particularly were applied to dimension mitigation structures or strategies.
datasets.project: SFRARR - Strengthening Financial Resilience and Accelerating Risk Reduction in Central Asia

referenced_by.name: Task 6 Earthquake and flood risk assessment
Task 6 Earthquake and flood risk assessment
Task 6 Earthquake and flood risk assessment - annex
Task 6 Earthquake and flood risk assessment - annex

resources.title: Central Asia flood risk return period summaries - KAZ
resources.description:
Central Asia flood risk return period summaries.

Estimated economic loss and fatalities per sector and for all sectors combined for fluvial flood risk (current defended and undefended scenarios, and for future climate scenarios)

Summaries aggregated at ADM1 (Oblast) and country level.

One csv file per loss breakdown, giving the estimated loss per return period.

resources.title: Central Asia flood risk return period summaries - regional level
resources.description:

resources.title: Central Asia flood risk EP curves - economic loss - flood climate change scenario 2080
resources.description:
Central Asia flood risk EP curves - economic loss - flood climate change scenario 2080.

Includes climate change and residential exposure change using SSP1, SSP4, and SSP5.

Estimated economic loss per sector and for all sectors combined, aggregated at ADM1, country, and regional levels.

One csv file per loss breakdown, giving the estimated loss per exceedance probability.

resources.title: Central Asia flood risk - Event Loss Tables (ELTs)
resources.description: Event Loss Tables (ELTs) showing the severity and frequency of estimated loss for each simulated flood event.

resources.title: Central Asia flood risk AAL and Return Period Loss maps
resources.description: Geospatial data layers describing estimated losses. Annual average loss and probable maximum losses at Oblast level.

resources.title: Central Asia flood risk scenario losses
resources.description: Tabulated summary of simulated fatalities and economic loss due to three selected 1-in-100-year fluvial flood scenarios (Kara-Unkur River, Parkent River, and Turkmenabat).

resources.title: Central Asia flood risk hazard intensity summaries
resources.description: Tabulated and map summaries of fluvial flood hazard intensity for selected infrastructure: airports, industrial sites, infrastructure, population and transport.
